description.value:
Your enchantment magic causes this arrow to temporarily beguile its target. The creature hit by the arrow takes a number of additional d6 equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1) extra psychic damage, and choose one of your allies within 30 feet of the target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or it is charmed by the chosen ally until the start of your next turn. This effect ends early if the chosen ally attacks the charmed target, deals damage to it, or forces it to make a saving throw.

After you reach 15th level in this class, you choose any number of allies within 30 feet of the target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or it is charmed by all of the chosen allies for up to 1 minute. This effect ends early for a chosen ally if they attack the charmed target, deal damage to it, or force it to make a saving throw.
